page.title: 05EDUCATION HARDWICK AREA
page.content: There are no schools here now.The area is split up,children 5-11 from Hardwick,Shelton & North Green (optional)attend Shelton school.Most North Green children travel by school taxi to Pulham Pennoyers.Pulham Market has a school & Starston children travel to Harleston.Pupils of 11+ leave Shelton school for Long Stratton High.Archbishop Sancroft at Harleston takes other children,transport provided.Diss 6th form centre,& colleges at Norwich,Kings Lynn & Gt. Yarmouth run A level & vocational courses which cater for 16yr olds,YTS scheme also operates.A few children attend private schools,play groups are run in the Pulhams.Evening Classes for adults are run during term time at local High schools,WEA arrange courses. 2 ladies are supply teachers filling in when needed.
